participant_1.background:
I am not sure how much I weigh, but I am healthy and fit.
i enjoy the occasional drink with friends.
I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame.
I enjoy spending time with my pets, they're always there for me when I need them.
i m allergic to cats.

participant_2.background:
I recently left my job after three years to travel the world.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
my favorite food is salad.
My parents were immigrants from Italy.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
It's going pretty well! I just left my job after three years, so I'm trying to figure out what's next.
Oh wow, that must be exciting! What are you thinking about doing next?
I'm not sure yet! I'm thinking about traveling the world, or maybe starting a business.
I think traveling the world would be a great idea! I've always wanted to do that myself.
Me too! I think it would be a really great experience.
What kind of business are you thinking about starting?
I'm not sure yet! I'm thinking about something food-related, maybe an ice cream shop.
That would be so cool! I love ice cream.
Me too! I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
That's so cool! I'm from the Midwest too.
Oh, cool! Where are you from?
That's so close! We should go get ice cream sometime!
